sentences.english: Should divine life be immured in the charnel house of fleshly lust?
sentences.chinese: 聖潔的生活應該埋葬在肉體情慾的墳墓內嗎？

sentences.english: Whenever Mr. B dates his girlfriend, he tries to turn her on.
sentences.chinese: 先生一旦與女友約會，就想激起她的情慾。

sentences.english: Get help in the form of a sex manual, a book of erotica, or an online sex shop.
sentences.chinese: 從性手冊，情慾書籍，網上性商店等方面取得幫助。

sentences.english: And within the grave there is no pleasure, for the blind-worm battens on the root.
sentences.chinese: 墳墓裏面沒有歡樂，因情慾之根只把蛆蟲養肥。

sentences.english: If your heart is free from ill - ordered affection, no good deed will be difficult for you.
sentences.chinese: 若心內沒有什麼邪僻的情慾，任何善工也不難做。

sentences.english: His Christian belief began to bleed into eroticism.
sentences.chinese: 他的基督教信仰開始滲透出情慾。

sentences.english: As requested by disciple Detong Dakini I had written a poem on sexual desires.
sentences.chinese: 應弟子茶桶空行之提請，我已寫了一首關於情慾的詩。
維多利亞時代的人經常將死亡情慾化。

sentences.english: Jiang Bin found the eight sister seems to move the truth want to leave, regardless of the matter.
sentences.chinese: 姜彬發現對八妹似乎動了真情慾想離去，不管此事。

sentences.english: Each system in the promotion of passion play an important role.
sentences.chinese: 每套系統在促進情慾中扮演着重要角色。

sentences.english: The good news is you’ll feel quite voluptuous.
sentences.chinese: 好消息是你感覺自己十分有情慾。

sentences.english: He could break the fetters of his foes, but not the cords of his own lust"."
sentences.chinese: 他能夠掙斷敵人綁他的麻繩，但不能掙脫情慾的束縛。

sentences.english: Under their stagnant respectability are whirlpools of evil and erotic passion.
sentences.chinese: 在他們一本正經的體面外表下，滿肚子的邪惡和情慾。

sentences.english: The PC becomes an erogenous zone.
sentences.chinese: 個人電腦變成了喚起情慾的地帶。

sentences.english: This is what produces the titanic life-or death struggle between the flesh and the Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 這就產生了在情慾與聖靈之間強烈的生死大戰。

definition: eternal/everlasting/fig. to pass into eternity (i.e. to die)
hungry and thirsty/(fig.) to crave (knowledge, love etc)
